TopicTitle: trouble getting docking ports to "connect" in vab

Articles.Content:
When building rockets and spaceplanes in 1.2, I can't get docking ports line up anymore and click together.  They work fine when actually docking, but when building, they wont click together like they used to in previous versions.  Has anyone else experienced this issue?

Edited October 28, 2016 by flatbear
Try putting the ports together by themselves.  put one on a vessel, the put the matching one on top of it, the put other parts on the second port

19 minutes ago, linuxgurugamer said:

Try putting the ports together by themselves.  put one on a vessel, the put the matching one on top of it, the put other parts on the second port

I tried that but they just wont click together in 1.2.  It used to work in previous versions.  Not sure if im doing something wrong or its just a 1.2 thing

2 hours ago, flatbear said:

I tried that but they just wont click together in 1.2.  It used to work in previous versions.  Not sure if im doing something wrong or its just a 1.2 thing

Why don't you post some screenshots explaining what you are trying to do.
Can't really tell what's going on in the first pic, but in the second one it sure looks like one of the ports is the kind with a toggled cover. That one will not attach in the VAB. Never has.

As johny said for the lower one, you cant connect those types in the vab(where you have to open the cover)

hard to really see for the first, surface attaching them, if they are at an odd angle, sometimes it messes up the second , sometimes its the angle your looking at it.  ive had some where it wouldnt snap so i placed it aside, and re-selected it, and it snapped. usually after a bit of trying all the different directions it could face ill get one that likes to snap.
I think you use the alt key to force node-only attachment in the vab. Looks like that may be your issue in the first pic? It wont "pick up" the node and just tries to attach radially?
In the first pic you're trying to attach a Jr. port to a standard-sized. They WILL connect in VAB if you hold Alt to force node connections. But they won't dock once you trigger 'decouple node'.

if your having trouble getting them to snap while they are on a surface attach, so that its an odd angle,   try placing the first port on a proper node, attach the port to it since they snap easier when straight up n down,  then move the first port to the surface location you want
